customFields.Update notes:

Prapti Shrestha (April 19, 2021) - Updated test steps to combine 1 & 2 and simplify (this also eliminates the confusion in Cypress test).
customFields.Cypress Reports: STABLE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Stable - TM4J key found Cypress master-prod run report (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
1. Log in as a team admin and open the team
  2. Open the main menu and click "Invite People"
  3. On the invite page that opens, hover over the close button (the “x” button in the top right)
  4. Select "Invite Members"
inline.expectedResult:
• After #3, the background highlight is centered around the X
  • After #4: 
    • User is taken to Invite Members page with 2 invite options:
      • Share This Link
      • Add or Invite People

customFields.Related ticket(s):
1. Invite People Modal - Close button (the “x” button in the top right) alignment is messed up — MM-21953
  2. (Duplicate) Web: X button on Invite Members modal isn't centred — MM-21943
